content: नृ [नी-ऋन् डिच्च; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 2. 101</ls>] (<ab>Nom.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> ना, <ab>gen.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab> नृणां or नॄणां) {@--1@} A man, a person whether male or female; <ls>Ms. 3. 81</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 61</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 61</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">10. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Mankind. {@--3@} A piece at chess. {@--4@} The pin of a sun-dial. {@--5@} A masculine word; संधिर्ना विग्रहो यानं <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--6@} A leader.
